name: Glitchy Lumberjack
description:
A small game made for the Backtrace Gamejam #3. Unfortunately I didn't spend enough time on it and ended up having to rush things as well as the game not actually being finished. I will try to finish it though, hopefully.

Credits:

  • Environment Art - https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic
  • Character Sprites - https://szadiart.itch.io/rpg-main-character
